title: State Management with React Apollo
description:
In this talk I'll divulge into Graphql and the main differences between REST. Then I'll talk of how Frontend has changed to accommodate the rise of Graphql, specifically React Apollo. From then it'll be a live coding session where I'll go through connecting to a Graphql server in a React application and fetching/mutating data both on server and client side data (with React Apollo @client directive)

I've been a professional developer for about 3 years. In that time I've worked for small startups to large corporations. List includes Ruby, Sky and Eurostar where I'm currently working. Twitter handle is @shadrech17

I confirm my talk will be 20 mins long ����

I will abide by the code of conduct
name: Tatenda Chawanzwa
